title: Riot Ripoff
body: Can't log in to the server because it keeps disconnecting me, and this is happening on the only weekend Riot gives out IP boost as a thank you. Well that's a good play Riot. Thank you

replies.body: There was an issue with the servers but everything should be okay now.  Updates on server problems are posted on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na), so be sure to bookmark it.  let me know if you have any questions!
LoL NA is currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.
LoL NA & OCE are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.
